text: Jin logon ne haqq ko maanne se inkar kiya hai woh apne maal khuda ke raaste se roakne ke liye sarf kar rahe hain aur abhi aur kharch karte rahenge, magar aakhir e kaar yahi koshishein unke liye pachtawe ka sabab banenge, phir woh magloob hongey, phir yeh kafir jahannum ki taraf gher laye jayenge
